Pimpri Chinchwad College of Engineering (PCCOE) was established in year 1999 and located in Pune city of Maharashtra state. PCCOE is affiliated to Savitribai Phule Pune University, formerly University of Pune.

patterns: tell me about all departments in pccoe
responses: Engineering, MCA ,Applied Sciences And Humanities , MBA,M.tech,Ph.D.
For more details about each department visit:www.pccoepune.com/index.php

patterns: Who is the HOD of MCA department
responses: Prof. Anjana Arakerimath

patterns: give me contact details of mca hod
responses:
Contact : 9890899132,
Email : a.anjana@pccoepune.org

patterns: can you give me college address please?
responses: Nigdi Road, Near Akurdi Railway Station, Sector No. 26, Pradhikaran, Nigdi, Pimpri Chinhwad, Maharashtra-411044.
here is a google map link:PCCOE Location

patterns: send me link to MCA syllabus
can I know the MCA syllabus
responses: You can find the MCA syllabus here:MCA-Syllabus

patterns: can you tell me about fees structure
responses: Here you can find detailed fees structure:Fee-structure

patterns: how do i get admission in pccoe?
responses:
the admission process of PCCOE is based on Entrance Exams.
For B.Tech. programme, the candidate must have a valid score in MHT CET
For M.Tech. programme, the candidate must have valid score in GATE
For MCA programme, the candidate must have to qualify in MAH MCA CET.
for more details visit :www.pccoepune.com/mca-home.php

patterns: How are the placements at PCCOE
responses: KPIT, Wipro, Cap Gemini, Mercedes Benz, Ritzy, TCS etc. are top recruiters who had visited the campus for recruiting students.
Here you can find details about placements :Placements
Why did the hipster burn his mouth? He drank the coffee before it was cool.
What did the buffalo say when his son left for college? Bison.

patterns: which scholarships are available for students?
responses:
1.Government of India Post-Matric Scholarship
2. Post-Matric Tuition Fee and Examination Fee (Freeship)
3. Rajarshri Chhatrapati Shahu Maharaj Merit Scholarship
4.Post-Matric Scholarship for persons with disability
Here you can find details about scholarships :Scholarships
Yes,PCCOE is an autonomous institute.Permanently Affiliated to SPPU

patterns: what is the rank of pccoe among all engineering colleges in India?
responses: The National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF) ranked it 197 among engineering colleges in 2020.

patterns: what are the facilities available in pccoe?
responses: PCCOE provide Central Library,Digital Library,Reading hall,Computer center,Hostel,Canteen,Gym,and many more.
To take a glance visit:College Infrastructure

patterns: tell me something about library in pccoe
responses: PCCOE provide Central Library with subscription of E-Journals like IEEE, Elsevier's,subscription of E-books,NPTEL

patterns: Is college provide hostel facility to students?
Is college has their own hostel?
responses: Yes.College provide hostel for both boys and girls.
Know more:Fees-structure for hostel

patterns: Is college provide hostel for boys?
responses: Yes.College has boys hostel with 170 doubled seated rooms and 99 tripled seated room with all required facilities.
To know more:Boys-Hostel

patterns: Is college provide hostel for girls?
responses: Yes.College has girls hostel with 10 doubled seated rooms and 240 tripled seated room with all required facilities.
To know more:Girls-Hostel

patterns: Does college have mess in campus?
responses: Yes.College have spacious mess in campus with good quality food.

patterns: give me link to syllabus for all courses
responses: Here is link for syllabus:Syllabus for all courses

patterns: Is college provide platform to students for extra activities?
Is there any platform for students extra curricular activities?
responses: Yes,college has 'Students Development & Welfare' section.Also there is platform 'Student Association Coordination Cell'for students.
Know more:Students Development & Welfare

patterns: under graduate programs offered by college
responses:
1.Mechanical Engineering,
2.Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering,
3.Computer Engineering,
4.Information Technology Engineering,
5.Civil Engineering,
6.Computer Engineering (AI and ML),
7.Computer Engineering (Regional Language)

patterns: post graduate programs offered by college
responses:
1.Mechanical Engineering - Design,
2.Mechanical Engineering - Heat Power,
3.Computer Engineering,
4.Information Technology Engineering,
5.Construction Management (Civil Engineering)

patterns: How to do online fee payment?
How do I pay my fees through online mode?
tell me about online fee payment
responses:
1.First,Login into college ERP,
2.Then,go to account section,
3.Select pay fees,
4.Select mode of online transaction,
5.After successful transaction,Download payment receipt,
6.Log out

patterns: How to get temporary grade card?
How do I download my temporary grade card?
responses:
1.First,Login into college ERP
2.Then,go to Examination section
3.Select Grade card
4.Download a copy of your statement of marks
5.Log out.

patterns: which courses in Ph.D are available in college?
responses:
1.Ph.D. in Computer Engineering
2.Ph.D. in Mechanical Engineering
3.Ph.D. in Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering

patterns: which B.VOC courses available in college?
B. VOC courses offered by pccoe
tell me about B.voc courses available in college
responses:
1.B.VOC. Degree - Solar Systems
2.B.VOC. Degree - Industrial Refrigeration and Air Conditioning
3.B.VOC. Degree - Mechatronics Engineer
4.B.VOC. Degree - IoT Engineer

patterns: how much is mca program's intake capacity?
responses: Master in Computer Application (MCA) program has intake capacity of 60 students.
